panels.description: Highest timestamp that has come into the remote storage via the Appender interface, in seconds since epoch.
panels.title: Highest Timestamp In vs. Highest Timestamp Sent

panels.description: Rate of duration of send calls to the remote storage
panels.title: Latency Over Rate Interval

panels.description: Rate of total number of samples appended to the WAL.
panels.title: Samples In Rate Over Rate Interval

panels.description: Rate of total number of samples sent to remote storage.
panels.title: Samples Out Rate Over Rate Interval

panels.description: The number of samples pending in the queues shards to be sent to the remote storage.
panels.title: Pending Samples

panels.description: Total number of samples which were dropped after being read from the WAL before being sent via remote write, either via relabelling or unintentionally because of an unknown reference ID.
panels.title: Dropped Samples

panels.description: Total number of samples which failed on send to remote storage, non-recoverable errors.
panels.title: Failed Samples

panels.description: Total number of samples which failed on send to remote storage but were retried because the send error was recoverable.
panels.title: Retried Samples

panels.description: The number of shards used for parallel sending to the remote storage.
panels.title: Current Shards

panels.description: The maximum number of shards that the queue is allowed to run.
panels.title: Max Shards

panels.description: The minimum number of shards that the queue is allowed to run.
panels.title: Min Shards

panels.description: The number of shards that the queues shard calculation wants to run based on the rate of samples in vs. samples out.
panels.title: Desired Shards

panels.description: The capacity of each shard of the queue used for parallel sending to the remote storage.
panels.title: Shard Capacity

panels.description: Current segment the WAL watcher is reading records from.
panels.title: Remote Write Current Segment

panels.description: Total number of times enqueue has failed because a shards queue was full.
panels.title: Enqueue Retries
